To make the sweet in the photo, you will need to mix together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, butter, eggs, milk, and vanilla extract. Then, add the desired mix-ins such as sprinkles, chocolate chips, or chopped nuts. After mixing together the ingredients, spoon the batter into a greased muffin tin or cupcake tin and bake in a preheated oven for about 20 minutes.
